issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: LiveView: Alloy RSS Reader sample: error saying 'null' is not an object at app.js

comments.body: Generated the PR and pushed to master branch.

Alloy RSS Reader app working fine with liveView.
Changes are reflected and app launches with change successfully.

liveView version 0.1.35
Tested Environment:

Appcelerator Studio: 3.2.0.201312101708
SDK:3.2.0.v20131210191510
alloy: 1.3.0-cr
acs: 1.0.10
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0-cr
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0-cr2
Xcode:5.0.2
OS: Mac OSX 10.9
Device: Google Nexus7(v4.3),IphoneSimulator(v7.0.3)
